title: Which technical clubs will be open to second-yearites?
content: Asking specifically for EC Campusâ€” Also, are there any prerequisites or skills we can start practicing in advance to improve our chances of getting shortlisted?

comments.body: All clubs hold recruitment once a year, if not twice (or more). So technically, all clubs will open recruitment at some point.
Just a question, why do you wanna get into a tech club so bad, it isn't all that

For networking purposes and to collaborate on projects that I could eventually showcase on my resume. If not clubs, what would you personally recommend instead for building a solid portfolio and getting some hands-on project experience?
